ChartPropKey.description: Allowed values are X For horizontal orientation and Y for vertical orientation
Not a chart property used for table which holds the graph
Width property for PDF viw if not given width property will be taken
Height property for for PDF viw if not given width property will be taken
Message to be displayed when there is no data
Font to be used for no data message. Eg: name=Dialog,size=10,style=BOLD
Color to be used for no data message in hexa decimal form. Eg: FF05F0
Whether to show the legend for the graph or not.
The font for the axis label
The font for the axis tick label
The format for the range axis. Can be either CURRENCY,PERCENT or NUMBER
The format for the graph label Eg: L_V
Whether to show the tooptip for the graph or not
